title: Xayah and Rakan soundtrack
body: Where can i find their complete soundtrack? Or is that in the log-in page already the full version?

replies.body:
Hey 1Ferdinand1,

The login page has their full theme music, which you can download at https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/rakan-and-xayah-the-charmer-and-the-rebel You can also listen to the teaser music at https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/xayah-and-rakan-wild-magic 

Hopefully, both tracks should give you a pretty solid idea of what our newest champions' universe sounds like!

Cheers,
Ed the Conqueror
I love the soundtracks so much, and i was looking for the teaser video sound track :D
